We have our working code not turn it into a first funcion
```{r}
grade <- function(x) {
  if( any(is.na(x))) {
    warning("Student is missing a homework")
  }
  mean( x[ -which.min(x)], na.rm = TRUE)
}
```

```{r}
url <- "https://tinyurl.com/gradeinput"
hw <- read.csv(url, row.names = 1)
```

```{r}
apply(hw, 1, grade)
```
